Trade/Device Name(s): BD MAX Enteric Parasite Control Panel
BD MAX Enteric Parasite 20-Day QC Panel
Regulation Name(s): Assayed quality control material for clinical microbiology assays
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD MAX Enteric Parasite Control and QC Panels for monitoring nucleic acid testing performance of enteric parasite detection on the BD MAX System
Indications for Use Summary: Intended as external assayed positive quality control materials to monitor in vitro nucleic acid testing procedures for qualitative detection of Cryptosporidium parvum, Giardia lamblia, and Entamoeba histolytica with the BD MAX Enteric Parasite Panel on the BD MAX System
